markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Torrential Backlash](/Feats.aspx?ID=3835) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 169</row>

**Archetype** [Curse Maelstrom](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=190)

**Prerequisites**
[Curse Maelstrom Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3829)

**Requirements**
You are in a curse maelstrom state.

</column>

---

Calling upon forbidden practices, you release the curse from within yourself, allowing it free rein to destroy everything around you. All creatures within your curse maelstrom emanation except you take 1d6 negative damage for each level you have, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. Your curse maelstrom state then ends.
name: Torrential Backlash
requirement: You are in a curse maelstrom state.
requirement_markdown: You are in a curse maelstrom state.
